question: I did not gift the tree when I bought it, am I still in time?
answer: The tree can be gifted at any moment, even after you bought it. To do so, access your profile by typing in the credentials you chose when you registered, click on the area dedicated to your trees (at the bottom of the page) and click on the tree you want to gift. Access the specific gifting area: here you can choose how to deliver your gift, via e-mail, via message or by means of a printable card.
